title: Set barn logo as PWA app icon and enable installable PWA support

requirements.summary: Generate the 'SPA FOR ACCURATE MEASURE' barn logo image in all required PWA icon sizes (192×192, 512×512, and 180×180) and save them as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated/
acceptanceCriteria: All icons visually match the uploaded barn logo with white background

file_operations.description: Generate 192×192px PWA icon of the barn logo illustration with arched uppercase text 'SPA FOR ACCURATE MEASURE' above a hand-drawn barn, 'BARN' label below barn, and cursive tagline 'For accurate measure' beneath, dark gray on white background, square format. This will be referenced in manifest.json.

Generate 512×512px PWA icon of the barn logo illustration with arched uppercase text 'SPA FOR ACCURATE MEASURE' above a hand-drawn barn, 'BARN' label below barn, and cursive tagline 'For accurate measure' beneath, dark gray on white background, square format. This will be referenced in manifest.json.

Generate 180×180px Apple Touch Icon of the barn logo illustration with arched uppercase text 'SPA FOR ACCURATE MEASURE' above a hand-drawn barn, 'BARN' label below barn, and cursive tagline 'For accurate measure' beneath, dark gray on white background, square format. This will be referenced in index.html.

requirements.summary: Update frontend/public/manifest.json to use the generated barn logo icons with correct app name, theme colors, and standalone display mode
acceptanceCriteria: manifest.json name is 'SPA For Accurate Measure'
manifest.json icons array references the generated 192×192 and 512×512 PNG files

file_operations.description: Update manifest to use the barn logo icons at frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-192x192.dim_192x192.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-512x512.dim_512x512.png. Set name to 'SPA For Accurate Measure', short_name to 'SPA Measure', background_color to '#ffffff', theme_color to '#ffffff', display to 'standalone', and start_url to '/'.

requirements.summary: Update frontend/index.html to reference the generated apple-touch-icon and verify PWA meta tags

file_operations.description: Update the apple-touch-icon link to point to the generated icon at /assets/generated/apple-touch-icon-180x180.png. Ensure theme-color meta tag is set to '#ffffff' and manifest link points to /manifest.json.

requirements.summary: Ensure frontend/public/sw.js service worker is correctly registered and caches the app shell including new barn logo icons for offline support and PWA installability
acceptanceCriteria: Service worker is registered in index.html
App shell files (index.html, manifest.json, icons) are precached on install
App passes PWA installability criteria (manifest + service worker + HTTPS)
Install prompt appears on supported Android browsers

file_operations.description: Update the CACHE_NAME to force cache refresh and ensure the app shell precache list includes the new barn logo icon assets: /assets/generated/icon-192x192.dim_192x192.png, /assets/generated/icon-512x512.dim_512x512.png, and /assets/generated/apple-touch-icon-180x180.dim_180x180.png. Verify that index.html, manifest.json, and core static assets are cached on install for offline access.
